name: void chat
shortDescription:
A forum app made with Java Swing that runs on a dedicated server. 
 
 Made for a group final project in an intro Computer Science class.

name: Wreck The Halls
shortDescription:
A Christmas (or Halloween?) themed twin-stick shooter about stopping the joy of the holiday season.

Made in 24 hours for Purdue’s IGDC Haloween Game Jam, with post-jam work done later.

name: burrito finance
shortDescription:
A simple personal spending tracker that tells you how much you’ve spent in burritos.

Made for personal use before entering college.

name: Duck Warfare
shortDescription:
A tower-defense-type game featuring a large cast of ducks and Newgrounds-era stylings.

My first major project.

name: R.C.B.P
shortDescription:
A simple puzzle game about controlling boxes with your mind.

Made in a week for the GDQ Game Jam.

name: VR Ducks
shortDescription:
A carnival shootout game where you fire ducks from a cannon.

My first published game.
